remarks: Restriction of a complex differentiable function to the reals.  This version of ~ dvres3 assumes that ` F ` is differentiable on its domain, but does not require ` F ` to be differentiable on the whole real line. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
statement:
dvres3a.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
dvres3a $p |- ( ( ( S e. { RR , CC } /\ F : A --> CC ) /\ ( A e. J /\ dom ( CC _D F ) = A ) ) -> ( S _D ( F |` S ) ) = ( ( CC _D F ) |` S ) ) $.
